com.guardtime.ksi.multisignature

Interface KSIMultiSignature


  • public interface KSIMultiSignature

    KSI multi signature is a container format for storing multiple keyless uni-signatures. This interface is designed to:

    • add uni signatures to the container
    • searching for a uni-signature in the container using the document hash
    • deleting a uni-signature from a container using the document hash
    • list all used hash algorithms used by the uni-signatures
    • extending signature

    NB! To createSignature a instance of KSIMultiSignature use one of the KSIMultiSignatureFactory implementation.

    See Also:
    KSIMultiSignatureFactory, FileBasedMultiSignatureFactory

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(KSISignature signature)
      This method is used to add uni-signature to the container.
      void extend(PublicationRecord publicationRecord)
      When called all (inc already extended) signatures are extended to a specific publication.
      void extend(PublicationsFile trustStore)
      When called, all unextended signatures are extended to the closest (oldest) publication possible.
      KSISignature get(DataHash documentHash)
      This method is used to search a uni-signature from the container.
      HashAlgorithm[] getUsedHashAlgorithms()
      This method returns the list of hash algorithms used by uni-signatures inside this multi signature container.
      void remove(DataHash documentHash)
      This method is used to remove uni-signature from the container.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(KSISignature signature)
  throws KSIException
        This method is used to add uni-signature to the container.
        Parameters:
        signature - uni-signature ti be added to the container
        Throws:
        KSIException - will be thrown when adding signature to the container fails.

      • get

        KSISignature get(DataHash documentHash)
          throws KSIException
        This method is used to search a uni-signature from the container.
        Parameters:
        documentHash - document hash that is used to search signatures.
        Returns:
        instance of uni-signature. always present.
        Throws:
        KSIException - will be thrown when signature isn't present or error occurs turning the search.

      • remove

        void remove(DataHash documentHash)
     throws KSIException
        This method is used to remove uni-signature from the container.
        Parameters:
        documentHash - document hash to be used to remove signature
        Throws:
        KSIException - will be thrown when error occurs

      • getUsedHashAlgorithms

        HashAlgorithm[] getUsedHashAlgorithms()
        This method returns the list of hash algorithms used by uni-signatures inside this multi signature container.
        Returns:
        list of hash algorithms. when multi signature container does not contain any uni-signatures then empty list is returned.

      • extend

        void extend(PublicationsFile trustStore)
     throws KSIException

        When called, all unextended signatures are extended to the closest (oldest) publication possible. If there is no suitable publication to extend one signature - that signature will not be extended.

        If there are more than one signature per round then only one extending request is sent

        Parameters:
        trustStore - KSI trust store to be used to search suitable publications.
        Throws:
        KSIException

      • extend

        void extend(PublicationRecord publicationRecord)
     throws KSIException

        When called all (inc already extended) signatures are extended to a specific publication. Signature isn't extended if a signature is a newer than the given publication.

        Parameters:
        publicationRecord - publication to extend
        Throws:
        KSIException
